channel.title: Clan chat redstone
channel.description:
Hello, on my client the redstone for clan chat dont load it doesn't high light say for e.g i clicked clan chat icon the friend list one will be highlighted.. Heres a pic of wat it is
[img]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/2614/clanchat.png[/img]
As u can see it's a bit weird. The clan chat icon should be highlighted not the friends..
Can anyone tell me how to make it normal Please note im usin bluurs client

item.title: Clan chat redstone
item.dc:creator: @stoneboyjosh stoneboyjosh
item.description:
@stoneboyjosh wrote:

This is a client sided error. Go to client.java in your client and search for
“aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_866.method348(80, 16083, 1);”
and the 80 which is this…^^
change it to 113.

Read full topic
